channel.title: Removing teleblock thing - 317 -
channel.description: Recently I downloaded a server base thing so I could start my own server without starting from scratch.Well I want the teleblock spell to work, but when you're in combat you can't tele away until the npc/player is dead. How can I remove this?

item.title: Removing teleblock thing - 317 -
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

There’s probably a condition that checks the ‘inCombat’ variable and makes it so if you’re in combat, then you can’t teleport.

Read full topic
